id: The Wall Street JournalOpinionChuck Schumer, Foiled Again
paragraph:
November 16, 2018Spare a tear for Chuck Schumer. In last week’s midterms, the Senate minority leader’s counterpart in the House, Nancy Pelosi, led her party back to a majority. Over in the White House, Donald Trump could claim a split decision. Which leaves only one unmitigated failure: Mr. Schumer. The elections saw his ambitions to become majority leader...
